title: Director's certificates, evidence
context: §36-7 Director&rsquo;s certificates, evidence. The director of finance may certify, under the seal of the director&rsquo;s department, copies of vouchers and other documents deposited in the director&rsquo;s office; and copies so certified shall be as valid evidence in any court as the originals. [CC 1859, §476; RL 1925, §1250; RL 1935, §2209; RL 1945, §5810; RL 1955, §132-10; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §14; am L 1963, c 114, §1; HRS §36-7; gen ch 1985]
